questions.question: Given matrix product H = USV',How many independent parallel streams can be formed?

explanations.a: The number of independent streams that can be fromed = Rank of the matrix i.e number of eigenvalues
explanations.b: The number of independent streams that can be fromed = Rank of the matrix i.e number of eigenvalues and not the value of the eigen value
explanations.c: The number of independent streams that can be fromed = Rank of the matrix i.e number of eigenvalues and not the value of the eigen value
explanations.d: Perfect! The matrix has 2 eigen values, hence can have two independent parallel streams
